SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwilragashscript


Begin OnPackageEnd fbmwilragashfollow
	SetStage fbmwILRescueRagrash 70
	SET fbmwILRescueRagrash.FollowNow TO 0
	mwRagashgraShuzgubREF.EvaluatePackage
END


Begin GameMode
	if GetStage fbmwILRescueRagrash == 50
		IF mwRagashgraShuzgubREF.GetDistance mwRagashEscapeMarker <= 256
			SetStage fbmwILRescueRagrash 70
			SET fbmwILRescueRagrash.FollowNow TO 0
			mwRagashgraShuzgubREF.EvaluatePackage
		ENDIF		
	ENDIF
END
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
